attributes.action: Reduce the number of Managers and Executives in the NHS by 50% by the end of the decade freeing vital money for patient care, for which it was intended.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of 'suits' has risen dramatically within the NHS, but very few have lost their jobs in the recent redundancies.  50% of managers, assistant managers, executives and other desk jockeys should be fired for not actually contributing to the health care of the nation, allowing more front line staff to treat patients.
